New Records: Aaron Jones hit ten sixes in the match, though it's noted that Chris Gayle has hit more in the T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: A 131-run partnership between Aaron Jones and Andries Gous was a major turning point in the match
USA won by 7 wickets with 14 balls remaining
Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Jones described USA's style of cricket as 'fearless, positive, and smart' before the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Corey Anderson became the fifth player to represent two different teams at the T20 World Cup
USA's dominant performance set the tone for the tournament
Others: The match was the first of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup, and USA's victory was their first in the event
